title: My First Year at UW-Madison and a Gallery of Awesome Student Projects
description: Not too long ago, in the Summer of 2018, I was super excited to join the Department of Statistics at the University of Wisconsin-Madison after obtaining my Ph.D. after ~5 long and productive years. Now, two semesters later after finals' week, I finally found some quiet days to look back on what's happened since then. In this post, I am sharing a short reflection as well as a some of the exciting projects my students were working on.
